parameters.query:
=select cpo.delivery_status as deliveryStatus,v.id as email,vpo.id as SDPO,vpo.po_value,i.id,vpo.po_date,oi.quantity as order_quantity,i.product,s.shipment_status,s.invoice_number,p.product_name,i.requested_qty,i.ordered_qty,s.id as sid,s.shipment_status,oi.sdm_po_items_id,vpo.po_status,delivery_date,pl.delivery_address,(delivery_date -now()) as due  from sdm_po_items i
join sdm_vendor_pos vpo on vpo.id = i.vendor_po
and delivery_date < NOW() + INTERVAL '1 Month'
and vpo.po_status not in('complete','canclelled','payment_pending','draft')
left join sdm_shipments s on s.vendor_po_num = vpo.id 
left join sdm_orders o on o.shipment = s.id
left join sdm_order_items oi on oi.sdm_orders_id = o.id 
and oi.sdm_po_items_id = i.id
join sdm_vendors v on v.id = vpo.vendor
join sdm_products p on p.id = i.product
join sdm_plants pl on pl.id = i.plant
join sdm_pos cpo on cpo.id = i.po
where cpo.delivery_status not in ('closed') and (shipment_status in ('open','awaiting_irn','awaiting_asn') or shipment_status is null)
limit 30
